title: JSON Schema for Espanso
description: A cross-platform Text Expander written in Rust

oneOf.description: Only available for Linux and combines the other two options.

backspace_limit.description: How many backspace espanso tracks to correct misspelled keywords.

enable_active.description: Disable the active mode for the current configuration.

enable_passive.description: Disable the passive mode for the current configuration.

parent.description: The target for the current configuration file, mainly used in packages.

ipc_server_port.description: Set the daemon listening port (Windows Only).

exclude_default_entries.description: Used in app-specific configs, avoid parent matches and global variables.

toggle_key.description: Change the key used to toggle espanso active mode.

passive_key.description: Change the key used to trigger passive mode.

secure_input_notification.description: Enable/Disable the Secure Input notification on macOS

show_icon.description: Show/Hide the icon in the status bar on macOS and Windows.

fast_inject.description: Use a faster injection mechanism (Linux only). It uses XSendEvent API rather than XTestFakeKeyEvent API, which is faster but incompatible with some applications.

name.description: The name of the current configuration.
